data.name: AppsSectionText2
data.value: Can't remember when your paper is due? Post a question on Spitball and get input from your peers.

data.name: AppsSectionText3
data.value: Find the class you've missed or the article you've been looking for in the library in the palm of your hand! Chat with your friends, ask questions and start studying for your next exam from any device.

data.name: AppsSectionTitle1
data.value: Find your school and start Spitballing.

data.name: AppsTitle
data.value: The simple way to share class notes, study guides, quizzes and more for FREE!

data.name: ProductTextBegining
data.value: Start studying like a pro with Spitball by following a few simple steps:

data.name: FeaturesSubTitle
data.value: Use Spitball to study with your friends and get better grades!

data.name: FeaturesSectionText2
data.value: See how well you are doing and quiz yourself with one of the hundreds of quizzes that your friends have built. Build and upload your own quiz to help your fellow classmates and check your own progress. Coming up with a quiz is a great way to prepare for an exam, so gain extra Spitball points and start building quizzes.

data.name: FeaturesSectionText4
data.value: Get to know your classmates, share notes and ideas, ask questions and chat with your friends about anything class related. Study together and be on your way to acing your finals! Get answers directly from your classmates to quickly solve problems when your TAs and professors are too busy.

data.value: Here’s a sample of Spitball’s 270,000 documents.

data.value: and class materials are uploaded everyday so you can get the most recent class material. Help build your school’s online community and get all the study materials you are looking for in one cool place. Couldn’t find your school? You can always access relevant class material from other schools, or be the first to use Spitball in your school and start the revolution!
